mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_CRE_DATE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_IDX DESC
SELECT R.RESERVE_IDX, T.TOUR_NAME, R.RESERVE_APPLY_DATE, R.RESERVE_DEPOSIT_STATE FROM RESERVE R, TOUR T WHERE R.TOUR_IDX = T.TOUR_IDX AND R.MEMBER_IDX = #{no}

SELECT RESERVE_APPLY_NUM, RESERVE_PRICE, (SELECT A1.ACC_ACCOUNT_NUM FROM TOUR T1, ACCOUNT_MANAGEMENT A1 WHERE T1.TOWN_IDX = A1.TOWN_IDX) AS TOUR_ACCOUNT_NUM FROM RESERVE WHERE RESERVE_IDX = #{reserveIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVE SET RESERVE_DEPOSIT_STATE = 'paid' WHERE RESERVE_IDX = #{reserveIdx}
